title: Yawning Face
description:
A yellow face with eyes closed and mouth wide open covered by a hand. Captured mid-yawn, this may represent having insufficient sleep, or to imply boredom with a person or topic.

Not to be confused with ðŸ˜ª Sleepy Face or ðŸ˜´ Sleeping Face, which often convey actually being asleep, or ðŸ˜« Tired Face which is tired as in "fed up".
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the yawning face emoji displays a distinctly tired yet amiable expression, with eyes squeezed shut and a wide, relaxed mouth caught mid-yawn. The characteristic soft rounded edges and subtle, warm skin tones contribute to its relatable portrayal of fatigue or boredom. This emoji, rendered with Apple's realistic lighting, effectively communicates a feeling of sleepiness, disinterest, or the need for a break in digital conversations.
